lightning.name: Lightning
lightning.desc: Harness the power of storms and electricity.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.desc: Touch attack. On hit, deal 2 Lightning damage and target can't take reactions until start of their next turn.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.desc: Line 6 spaces. All creatures in line make an AD save or take 3 Lightning damage.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.desc: Ranged spell attack. On hit, deal 2 Lightning damage. The lightning then jumps to up to 2 other targets within 3 spaces of the first.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.desc: Manipulate minds and bend reality with mental power.

spells.name: Mind Sliver
spells.desc: Ranged spell attack. On hit, deal 2 Psychic damage and target has disadvantage on their next save.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.desc: Target makes an MD save or is confused (acts randomly) until the end of their next turn.

spells.name: Psychic Scream
spells.desc: Burst 2. All creatures in area make an MD save or take 3 Psychic damage and are stunned until the end of their next turn.

holy.name: Holy
holy.desc: Channel divine light to heal allies and smite foes.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.desc: Target makes an AD save or takes 2 Radiant damage. Ignores cover.

spells.name: Bless
spells.desc: Up to 3 targets within 6 spaces gain +1 to attack checks and saves for 1 minute.
